author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the garlic for 1-2 minutes. Pour the chicken or vegetable stock into the pan and add the broccoli florets.  Bring to the boil and reduce the heat and simmer gently for 10-12 minutes, until the broccoli is tender. Season with salt and pepper, then transfer to a liquidizer. Blend until smooth. Ladle the soup into serving bowls and drizzle with cream to serve.
